summary: This is an email chain from May 12, 2021, discussing the scheduling of a witness interview that is a 'spin-off' from the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The purpose is to decide whether to open a new investigation. The email involves coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and an agent.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses a witness interview that is a 'spin-off' from the Maxwell case, indicating she is the central figure from which this new investigative activity stems.

events.title: Tentative Witness Interview Scheduled
events.description: A witness interview, described as a 'spin-off' from the Ghislaine Maxwell case, is tentatively scheduled for this date. The purpose is to decide whether to open a new investigation.

keyFacts: A new investigative interview related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case was being scheduled as of May 2021.
The interview involved a witness and was coordinated with a victim's attorney.
The purpose of the interview was to determine whether to open a new, separate investigation (a 'spin-off').
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was involved in the coordination.
